Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2010...
Injured on 9/9/2012 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/8/2014, off Jerome Williams (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/2014, off Julian Rudnick (COL)...
Had 27-game hitting streak snapped on 8/22/2014...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2014, hitting .331 with 14 HR, 82 RBI...
Traded from New York (N) to San Diego on 7/31/2016 (Going to SDN: CF C. Yelich, P T. Rousey. Going to NYN: C V. Martinez, LF E. Dukes, 2B A. Diaz, P E. Lipton, CF C. Coghlan)...
Drove in 6 runs against Arizona on 7/8/2018...
Traded from San Diego to Chicago (A) on 2/8/2019 (Going to SDN: P I. Joly, SS J. Cronin Jr., CF G. Gilmore Jr.. Going to CHA: LF C. Yelich, 3B M. Rivera)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Seattle on 4/3/2019...
Traded from Chicago (A) to New York (A) on 6/16/2019 (Going to NYA: LF C. Yelich, C J. Phegley. Going to CHA: C F. Madden Jr., P R. Walberg Jr., P E. Heusser Jr., C M. Kamps, P A. Sonnanstine).
